title: PM expresses grief over demise of Senator Abbas Afridi
content:
MAKKAH-AL-MUKARRAMAH, Jun 6 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the death of Senator and Federal Minister Abbas Afridi.
In a message, the prime minister prayed to Allah Almighty to elevate the ranks of the departed soul in Jannah.
He also prayed for grant of courage to the bereaved family members to bear the loss with equanimity.
